feature.label: Picture Viewer Feature
feature.description: Image/picture viewer plugin for Eclipse. Support viewing all images present in Target Platform and Worskpace with sorting/quick search, copying to workspace or file system etc.
feature.license: This software is licensed under EPL v 1.0 The Eclipse Public License is designed to be a business-friendly free software license, and features weaker copyleft provisions than licenses such as the GNU General Public License.
